articles.title: General Bureau of Software Industry Delegation Leaves for Mongolia
articles.content:
General Bureau of Software Industry Delegation Leaves for Mongolia
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Bureau of Software Industry of the DPRK headed by General Director Kang Yong Jun left here on Saturday to visit Mongolia.

articles.title: Joint Street March of KPA and Russian Army Held
articles.content:
Joint Street March of KPA and Russian Army Held
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- A joint street march and military music ceremony were staged here on Saturday by the Military Band of the Korean People's Army (KPA), the central military orchestra of the Ministry of Defense of Russia and the Female Brass Band of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces.
					 The participants solemnly played immortal revolutionary hymns  "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il" and "March for Songun Victory", looking up to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill at its foot.
					
					 They started the joint street march to Kim Il Sung Square.
					
					 Flying the flags of the DPRK and the supreme commander, the Military Band of the KPA and the Female Brass Band of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces marched, dynamically playing songs "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung", "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Cost of Our Lives", etc.
					
					 Flying the national flag of Russia, the members of the central military orchestra of the Ministry of Defense of Russia marched in sky-high spirit, playing songs "Song of Soviet Army", "Katyusha", etc.
					
					 People from all walks of life in the capital city warmly waved to the marchers.
					
					 The marchers' ranks entered Kim Il Sung Square amid high enthusiasm.
					
					 KPA Colonel General O Kum Chol,  Mun Chol, vice-chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, officers of the KPA, working people and youth and students in the city greeted them.
					
					 Present there were Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials and members of the military attache corps here.
					
					 There took place a military music ceremony on the square.
					
					 The army artistes of the two countries presented diverse formations, playing military music.
					
					 They played the national anthems of the DPRK and Russia and "Ode to Motherland", "'Ulan' March", etc.

articles.title: Wreath Laid before Liberation Tower by Russian Military Orchestra
articles.content:
Wreath Laid before Liberation Tower by Russian Military Orchestra
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The central military orchestra of the Ministry of Defense of Russia led by Chief Conductor Valery Khalilov, head of the military-orchestra service of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower on Saturday.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were officers of the Korean People's Army and staff members of the office of the military attache of the Russian embassy here.
					
					 After laying a wreath before the tower in the name of the central military orchestra of the Ministry of Defense of Russia, the participants paid silent tribute to the martyrs of the Soviet Army who fell in the battles for the liberation of Korea.
					
					 They went round the tower.

articles.title: Rason-Yanji Angling Tourists' Festival Held
articles.content:
Rason-Yanji Angling Tourists' Festival Held
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Rason-Yanji festival of angling tourists took place in Rason City, the economic and trade zone in the DPRK, on Saturday.
					 The festival was held pursuant to an agreement reached between the Rason International Travel Company and Yanbian Jiuzhou Travel Agency in Jilin Province, China.
					
					 Its objective is to meet the demand of the tourists to enjoy a rich emotional life and to develop exchange and cooperation between the Association of Angling Fans in Rason City and the Association of Anglers in Korean Nationality Autonomous Prefecture in Yanbian, Jilin Province.
					
					 Speeches were made at the opening ceremony.
					
					 A contest of angling freshwater fish took place amid interest of fans.
					
					 Prizes were awarded after the contest.
					
					 The festival offered an important occasion for further developing tourist business between Rason City and Jilin Province.
					
					 Freshwater angling tourism is expected to be combined with sea fish angling tourism in the future.

articles.title: More Provincial Mass Rallies Held
articles.content:
More Provincial Mass Rallies Held
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies took place in North Hwanghae, Jagang and Kangwon provinces on Saturday on the occasion of June 25, the day of the struggle against U.S. imperialism.
					 Present there were officials of the local party, power and economic bodies and working people's organizations, people of all social standings, youth and students.
					
					 Representatives of people from all walks of life took the floor.
					
					 Speakers said that the U.S. imperialists ignited the war of aggression 64 years ago and committed unheard-of inhuman crimes in Korea.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists surrendered to the army and people of the DPRK who turned out as one, rallied close around the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, and signed the document of surrender, they noted.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, far from drawing a due lesson from the disgraceful defeat they suffered in the Korean war, are becoming all the more pronounced in the moves to ignite a new war with the ambition to stifle the DPRK, they said.
					
					 They expressed the will to win the final victory in the confrontation with the U.S., achieve the historic cause of national reunification, step up the building of a thriving socialist nation and thus accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Then followed anti-U.S. demos.

articles.title: Sunchon Wharf Built in DPRK
articles.content:
Sunchon Wharf Built in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- In the DPRK Sunchon Wharf began its operation for Sunchon-Pyongyang-Nampho shipping service.
					 With a total area of 26 000 square meters, the wharf is able to accept several cargo ships of hundreds of tons at the same time. It has pier with a length of several hundred meters, open storage ground and office building.
					
					 This wharf was built in a little more than one year after the start of its construction in March last year.
					
					 Meanwhile, a Sunchon-Pyongyang-Nampho route was opened on the River Taedong to ensure the freight and passenger transport.

articles.title: New Technical Innovations Introduced to Construction
articles.content:
New Technical Innovations Introduced to Construction
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- New building methods and technical innovations have been introduced to speed up the construction of Wisong Scientists Street in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The methods include a precision shuttering method for monolithic construction, which makes it possible to put the production of frameworks and jigs on an industrial and standardized basis. This method is applicable to stairway concrete tamping. 
					
					 Among the innovations is a carbon monoxide scavenger, developed by the Environmental Engineering Institute under the State Academy of Sciences to prevent the damage from coal gas and pollution in a house.
					
					 Besides, there are a new kind of tile mortar, which is good for preventing tile albinism and raising effect of architectural beauty, a new type of steel reform machine and a program for ensuring the mixing ratio of compo mortar in a rational way.

articles.title: DPRK Takes Measures against Flood Damage
articles.content:
DPRK Takes Measures against Flood Damage
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Anti-flood steps are taken in the DPRK to cope with the approaching rainy season.
					 A brisk work is going on to protect human lives and production means and social properties from possible flood and rainstorm.
					
					 In rural communities, big efforts are directed to cleaning out waterways and ditches and readjusting river and stream courses as well as to anti-land-sliding project.
					
					 In collieries and mines, an effort is concentrated on checking and repairing the drainage system and water pumps and other facilities in pits.
					
					 Similar measures are also taken in railway transport and hydroelectric production and other fields and at the sites of different projects, while the industrial establishments strive to store enough raw materials for continued production in the rainy season.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Ever-victorious History of Korean Revolution
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Ever-victorious History of Korean Revolution
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The long history of the Korean revolution is a glorious one in which it has won victories by dint of great ideology. Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an editorial article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The great idea serves as an ever-victorious treasured sword for firmly defending the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the nation, a mighty weapon for achieving the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks and an engine for performing miracles and exploits by giving fullest play to the mental power of the masses.
					
					 The only weapon for the Korean revolution which started from scratch is the Juche idea, Songun revolutionary idea propounded by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Thanks to the great Juche idea, Songun revolutionary idea based on the spirit of independence, the Korean people could become the people strong in independence and firmly establish Juche in all fields including politics, military affairs, economy and culture. 
					
					 The President and leader Kim Jong Il always firmly upheld the independent stand in the revolution and construction. It was thanks to their leadership that neither high-handed acts of the imperialists nor pressure of the big-power chauvinists could bring the Korean people to their knees. 
					
					 The single-minded unity of the DPRK is based on the great revolutionary idea. 
					
					 The revolutionary forerunners of the first generation including Kim Hyok and Cha Kwang Su held Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the center of the unity and established the tradition of single-minded unity under the banner of the Juche idea. 
					
					 Through the drive for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism the single-minded unity of the DPRK centered on the leader has grown stronger than ever before. 
					
					 The Juche idea, Songun revolutionary idea instills into the service personnel and people of the DPRK awareness of being the masters of their own destiny, pride and belief in the strength of the nation and dearness of arms. The great mental power of Kim Il Sung's nation could be created thanks to this Juche idea, Songun revolutionary idea. 
					
					 The great Juche idea, Songun revolutionary idea is now more strikingly demonstrating its undisputable truth and power to make great changes under the outstanding steersmanship of supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The final victory is in store for the service personnel and people of the DPRK fully equipped with the great idea and spirit.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Refutes US Ruling Circles' Talk about "Threat" from DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Refutes US Ruling Circles' Talk about "Threat" from DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article raps American ruling quarters for floating a flurry of fictions about "threat" from the DPRK.
					 The article cites facts to prove the history of aggression in which the U.S. has waited for every opportunity to swallow up the whole of Korea. It is none other than the U.S. which has pushed the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of war, it notes, and goes on:
					
					 A scrutiny into the "provocations" by the DPRK cited by the U.S. shows that they are nothing but a legitimate exercise of the right by a dignified state which values independence and self-defence.
					
					 Whoever loves justice and peace should judge the situation on the peninsula with reason free from any prejudice.
					
					 The U.S. styling itself "the world's only superpower" staged war exercises in the land, the seas and the sky against other country by hurling into them even troops of its allied states which participated in the past war and massively mobilizing latest nuclear war hardware including B-52, B-2A, nuclear carriers and nuclear submarines which had earned ill fame in the wars of aggression including ones in Yugoslavia, Iraq and Afghanistan. The question is how the country should react to these provocations.
					
					 Lurking behind the above-said U.S. propaganda is a cynical ploy to make the best use of the human and material resources of the allied states under the above-said pretext, while allocating less military spending, and knock into shape the U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular military alliance in a bid to establish a military and strategic edge over its neighboring big powers and prevent its position as the "only superpower" from sinking.
					
					 Its more important aim is to put spurs to its preparations for the second Korean war, concludes the article.

articles.title: US Talk about "Threat" from DPRK Snubbed
articles.content:
US Talk about "Threat" from DPRK Snubbed
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The assistant secretary of State for East Asian and Pacific Affairs of the U.S. State Department grumbled about "nuclear and missile threats" from the DPRK and called for building U.S.-led information network involving Japan and south Korea and joint investment in the missile defense system to be deployed in south Korea during his recent meeting with riff-raffs of south Korea in Washington.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a revelation of the sinister intention to draw Japan and the south Korean puppet forces deeper into the moves for carrying out its strategy for stifling the DPRK.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Japan and south Korea are complaining about the waning strength of the U.S. behind the scene when watching its weak position in face of the DPRK though it behaved as if it could do anything in the world after the end of the Cold War.
					
					 What plagues the U.S. is the political contradiction and conflict between Japan and south Korea that prevent them from coming to harmony.
					
					 By bringing the contradiction between the stooges under control with rhetoric about "threat" from the DPRK, the U.S. seeks to realize the tripartite military cooperation and pursue a hostile policy toward the DPRK by dint of nexus.
					
					 In pursuing the tripartite military cooperation the U.S. seeks a sinister scenario for pressurizing its stooges to spend a lot of funds in a bid to lay with ease a springboard for containing major big powers and maintain its position as the "world's only superpower".
					
					 What the U.S. should know clearly is that it can never regain its unchallenged position now in the process of becoming weak no matter how loudly it may trumpet about the "threats" from the DPRK.
					
					  Isn't it a reality that Japan and the south Korean puppet forces are reluctant to dance to the tune of the U.S., the commentary notes.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to behave itself, clearly aware of where it stands at present, it warns.

articles.title: Minju Joson Terms "Threat from North" Touted by Park Geun Hye Group Hypocrisy
articles.content:
Minju Joson Terms "Threat from North" Touted by Park Geun Hye Group Hypocrisy
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Units of the south Korean puppet army on June 25 instilled hostility toward fellow countrymen into the minds of soldiers under the pretext of "intensive mental education" by twisting the truth about the June 25 Korean war. Puppet Prime Minister Jong Hong Won, addressing an "event marking the 64th anniversary of the June 25 war", blustered that the south would resolutely cope with the "threat from the north".
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Saturday terms it a revelation of their cynic ploy to cover up their true colors as the arch criminal who ignited the fratricidal war together with the U.S. and started the Korean war and justify their moves for a war against the north.
					
					 Terming the "threat from the north" much touted by the Park Geun Hye group hypocrisy, the commentary says:
					
					 The danger of a nuclear war has not been defused but is increasing day by day on the Korean peninsula entirely because the Park group is frantically escalating those war moves against the north in league with outsiders.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the puppet warmongers have become evermore undisguised in their moves to join in the U.S. missile defense system.
					
					 If they ship THAAD into south Korea and join in the U.S. MD, the danger of a nuclear war will further increase not only on the Korean peninsula but also in Northeast Asia.
					
					 However, the Park group is loudmouthed about the "threat from the north." This is just like a guilty party filing the suit first.
					
					 The group is working with blood-shot eyes to unleash the second Korean war, far from owning the blame for igniting the Korean war.
					
					 The Park group's reckless moves for a war against the north would only precipitate its self-destruction.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts US New Combat Doctrine
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts US New Combat Doctrine
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The U.S. announced a plan to introduce new combat doctrine AIR-SEA BATTLE to the Korean peninsula.
					 The keynote of the war method is to ensure the coordinated operations between the air force and the navy from the deployment of troops to battles in tactical, operational and strategic stages, according to the commander of the U.S. 7th air force on June 19.
					
					 This war method envisages a large-scale landing operation from the sea involving all troops in the three services and those serving in the space and cyber fields, not just limiting the combat sphere to the Korean peninsula but considering the whole world as a combat zone.
					
					 This is a dangerous military move indicating that the U.S. hegemonic ambition to put the peninsula under its control by force and put the Asia-Pacific region under its political and military domination with the peninsula as a springboard is being pushed forward in the phase of practical implementation.
					
					 It is the core of the U.S. hegemonic strategy to contain big powers in the Asia-Pacific region and maintain and expand its domination by relying on its military edge.
					
					 In fact, the U.S. has steadily reinforced its troops in the region.
					
					 More than half of the U.S. nuclear submarines are being deployed in the region, turning the Pacific into a theater for competition among world big powers.
					
					 The U.S. attaches great significance to implementing the new combat doctrine in order to turn the balance of forces favorable for it and expand the sphere of domination.
					
					 The application of the new doctrine to the peninsula is related to the geo-political position of the peninsula in the region.
					
					 The U.S. has massively reinforced its naval and air forces while "reorganizing" its ground forces present in south Korea.
					
					 By introducing new-type weapons and elite units, it turned south Korea into the biggest arsenal of latest weaponry in the Far East and a base for mounting a preemptive nuclear attack.
					
					 Through the introduction of the new doctrine the U.S. seeks to rationally deploy its forces present in south Korea for carrying out its strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The plan to replace A-10 and F-16 fighters in south Korea by F-35 is part of this scenario.
					
					 The U.S. hegemonic moves to put pressure on the DPRK, contain big powers and put the Asia-Pacific region under its political and military domination through group military actions have entered a graver phase due to the introduction of the new doctrine for aggression.
					
					 The U.S. reckless moves have rendered the situation in and around the peninsula so grave that a war may break out any moment there.
					
					 The prevailing situation compels the DPRK to further bolster the war deterrence.
					
					 The DPRK is firmly protecting the basic interests of the revolution and the dignity of the country while resolutely countering the imperialists' vicious moves against it as it has built powerful capabilities for self-defense.
					
					 As the U.S. persistently works to contain the DPRK by force, not giving up its hostile policy toward it, the latter is left with no option but to channel sustained big efforts to bolstering the capabilities to defend the sovereignty of the country.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive Accused of Her Personal Affairs Policy
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive Accused of Her Personal Affairs Policy
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo in an editorial on June 24 accused Park Geun Hye of her personnel affairs policy of appointing betes noires only.
					 Intolerable are Ri Pyong Gi's "operation for the north wind" and bribing of politicians, Kim Myong Su's suspected plagiarizing of his disciple's paper and pro-Japanese careers of grandparents of Han Min Gu, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 In the long run, Park Geun Hye is willing to turn the conservative cabinet into the ultra-right cabinet, pro-Japanese cabinet and war cabinet.
					
					 Park's recent handling of personal affairs brought to light her treacherous and undemocratic nature.
					
					 The problem cannot be settled fundamentally unless the Park Geun Hye regime steps down.

articles.title: US Accused of Bringing only Misfortune and Pain to Koreans
articles.content:
US Accused of Bringing only Misfortune and Pain to Koreans
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., in a commentary on June 24 denounced the U.S. for bringing only misfortune and pain to the Korean nation.
					 It was none other than the U.S. which divided the Korean peninsula and ignited the Korean war, the commentary said, and went on:
					
					 After occupying south Korea, the U.S. installed a "separate government" and suppressed the patriotic, progressive and democratic forces. It prodded traitor Syngman Rhee into unleashing the war in order to hold supremacy in Northeast Asia as part of its scenario for world domination.
					
					 More than 60 years have passed since then but the U.S. has forced colonial slavery upon south Korean people.
					
					 The commentary called upon all the patriotic fellow countrymen at home and abroad to pool their efforts under the banner of By Our Nation Itself and turn out as one in the struggle to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: US Urged to Stop Nuclear War Maneuvers
articles.content:
US Urged to Stop Nuclear War Maneuvers
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Kwon Hon, chief of the Shenyang City branch of the General Association of Koreans in China, issued a statement condemning the U.S. imperialists for their reckless moves to invade the north.
					 The U.S. has not abandoned its ambition to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and dominate the world for decades since the ceasefire, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 A nuclear war may break out on the Korean peninsula any time due to the reckless military hysteria of the U.S. to start a nuclear war. But it is a foolish daydream of the U.S. to destroy the DPRK with nukes.
					
					 The U.S imperialists should clearly understand that the Korean peninsula is no longer what it used to be in 1950, stop the nuclear war maneuvers immediately and pull out of south Korea at once.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Malaysia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Malaysia
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- A Malaysian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed on June 24.
					 The manager of the Dombo Enterprise Company was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 It decided to hold various political and cultural events to laud the noble revolutionary career and undying feats of the President from June 24 to July 9.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Day Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Day Commemorated Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Organizations and institutions of various countries and a regional body posted special write-ups on their websites from June 7 to 19 to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK in an article titled "WPK and General Secretary Kim Jong Il" illustrated with a portrait of the smiling leader said the invincible might of the WPK which has organized and guided all victories of the Korean people would be unthinkable without him.
					
					 It is entirely ascribable to the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Il that the DPRK has ranked itself among a few satellite manufacturers and launchers and nuclear weapons states in the world, the article said, adding:
					
					 He will always be alive along with the ever-victorious WPK steering the general advance of the Korean people for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia, the Kirov Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK, the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, the Britain-Korea Friendship Association, the MS Travel Agency of Germany and the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions posted articles titled "Kim Jong Il, undying exploits in party-building", "Songun brilliant commander and socialist Korea" illustrated with his photos.
					
					 The articles lauded him for developing the WPK into an ideologically pure entity, an integral organization, the party which achieved the unity of actions, a mighty guiding force of the revolutionary cause of Songun and the mother party absolutely supported and trusted by the popular masses.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits in Party-Building Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits in Party-Building Praised by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Events took place in foreign countries on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They included a meeting and book and photo exhibition in Mexico, lecture and film show in Dominica, lecture in the Czech Republic and round-table talks in Nepal between June 14 and 19.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un. On display there were their works.
					
					 The participants of the film show watched Korean film "Fireworks of a thriving nation." 
					
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, said in his speech that Kim Jong Il was a peerless political elder who shattered the imperialist reactionary forces' moves against the DPRK and socialism and defended the global cause of socialism, holding high the banner of Songun, independence and socialism.
					
					 Ivan Rodriguez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Alternative Party of Dominica, praised Kim Jong Il for developing the WPK into Kim Il Sung's party, frustrating the imperialist allied forces' moves to stifle socialism with the invincible Songun politics and providing a springboard from which to build a thriving nation.
					
					 The acting general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party said that the DPRK is holding high the banner of socialism even under the complicated situation, adding that this would be unthinkable apart from the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), the chairman of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (United) and other speakers said that the WPK and the Korean people are fortunate to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the WPK.

articles.title: WPK Praised by Organs of Political Parties of Syria, Britain
articles.content:
WPK Praised by Organs of Political Parties of Syria, Britain
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Organs of Syrian and British political parties carried articles on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Al Baath, the organ of the Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party, on June 19 said in an article titled "Ever-victorious Workers' Party of Korea and leader Kim Jong Il" that the WPK developed into a powerful one steadfastly advancing despite all storms of history.
					
					 The article said that the WPK serves as the eternal banner of struggle and victory encouraging not only the Korean people but also the world progressive peoples.
					
					 Al Nour, the organ of the Communist Party of Syria (Unity), in an article titled "Developing WPK into an invincible party" on the same day praised Kim Jong Il for strengthening the WPK.
					
					 The New Worker, the organ of the New Communist Party of Britain, on June 6 said in an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il who developed the Juche idea" that he proclaimed the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism as the supreme programme of the WPK and led the party building and activities aimed to implement the Songun revolutionary line to bolster up the defence capability of the country in every way.

articles.title: DPRK Photo, Book and Handicraft Exhibitions Open in Russia, Peru
articles.content:
DPRK Photo, Book and Handicraft Exhibitions Open in Russia, Peru
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK photo, book and handicraft exhibitions were open at the Dmitrov City History Museum in Moscow Region, Russia, the Far Eastern State Library in Khabarovsk and in a city, Piura Province, Peru from June 10 to 19 to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 On display at the venues of the exhibitions were photos documenting his undying party-building leadership feats.
					
					 On show there were works of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un and photos, books and handicrafts introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 The vice-mayor of Dmitrov City, Moscow Region, Russia said that the WPK developed into an ever-victorious party whose members are united in single mind and the mother party serving the people thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Legislative Assembly of Khabarovsk Territory of Russia said that the great party-building leadership feats of Kim Jong Il are shedding their rays along with socialist Korea winning victory after victory.
					
					 The mayor of the city, Piura Province, Peru said the exhibition will help the citizens get to know better about the DPRK, wishing the Korean people greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Bulgarian Organization Expresses Solidarity with Korean People
articles.content:
Bulgarian Organization Expresses Solidarity with Korean People
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association released an information bulletin on June 20 to mark the month for the international solidarity with the Korean people.
					 The bulletin said:
					
					 After World War II, the Korean peninsula was divided into the north and the south due to foreign forces.
					
					 The history of the U.S. imperialists' military occupation of south Korea dated back to September, 1945.
					
					 The U.S. saw to it that the south Korean puppet army was organized to carry out the strategy of putting the whole Korean peninsula under its control.
					
					 The U.S. and its south Korean puppet regime started their invasion of the DPRK on June 25, 1950.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK employed their own unique war methods, dealing telling blows to the enemy.
					
					 A lasting peace has not yet settled on the peninsula for decades since the Armistice Agreement was signed on July 27, 1953.
					
					 November, 1975 witnessed the adoption of a resolution calling for disbanding the "UN Command" in south Korea at the 30th session of the UN General Assembly.
					
					 However, the U.S. forces are working hard to make their presence in south Korea legal, going by the name of the "UN Forces".
					
					 The U.S. wages large-scale war drills in league with the south Korean war-like forces every year, thus screwing up the tensions on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The world progressives hold colorful events in the month, the period from June 25 to July 27.
					
					 We extend solidarity to the Korean people in the struggle to successfully defend the sovereignty of the country and socialism from the challenges of every description by the U.S. imperialists and their allied forces.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Malaysian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Malaysian Figure
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The manager of the Dombo Enterprise Company of Malaysia who was elected chairman of the committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung at the inaugural ceremony held on June 24 praised him a great sage who founded the immortal Juche idea and successfully applied it to the revolution and construction.
					 The manager went on:
					
					 The President performed great exploits before the country, people, the era and history and devoted all his thinking and activities to the people, regarding them as in heaven.
					
					 His revolutionary idea was formulated as Kimilsungism by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean people are ushering in a new heyday of the era of Songun under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Bandas militares de Corea y Rusia realizan marcha y ceremonia de musica militar
articles.content:
Bandas militares de Corea y Rusia realizan marcha y ceremonia de musica militar
Pyongyang, 28 de junio (ACNC) -- La banda militar del Ejercito Popular de Corea, la banda militar central del Ministerio de Defensa de la Federacion Rusa y la banda femenina de instrumentos de viento del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea realizaron el dia 28 en esta capital la marcha conjunta y ceremonia de musica militar.
					Al pie de la colina Mansudae, donde estan las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, las bandas de ambos paises interpretaron con solemnidad los inmortales himnos revolucionarios "Cancion del General Kim Il Sung" y "Cancion del General Kim Jong Il" y la otra "Marcha de triunfadores de Songun".
					
					Ellos hicieron la marcha hacia la Plaza Kim Il Sung.
					
					Flameando a la cabeza de la fila la bandera nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la de Comandante Supremo, la banda militar del EPC y la femenina de instrumentos de viento del ESIPC marcharon interpretando con dinamismo las canciones "Viva el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung", "Defenderemos a costa de la vida al General Kim Jong Un", etc.
					
					Los integrantes de la columna de marcha de la banda militar central del Ministerio de Defensa de la Federacion Rusa marcharon con la bandera nacional de Rusia al frente, interpretando "Cancion del Ejercito de URSS", "Katyusha", etc. 
					
					Las filas de marcha conjunta recibieron bienvenida de las masas de diversos estratos.
					
					Las filas llegaron a la Plaza Kim Il Sung.
					
					Las acogieron el coronel general del EPC, O Kum Chol, el vicepresidente del Comite Popular de la ciudad de Pyongyang, Mun Chol, los oficiales del EPC, los trabajadores, los jovenes y estudiantes de esta capital, el embajador Alexandr Timonin y los integrantes de la embajada rusa en Corea y los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares en Corea.
					
					Hubo la ceremonia de musicas militares.
					
					Los artistas militares de dos paises mostraron diversas formas interpretando las musicas militares.
					
					Ellos ejecutaron juntos el "Himno Patriotico", "Himno Nacional de Rusia", "Himno a la Patria" y "Marcha de ´Ulan´".

articles.title: Tiene lugar festival de turismo de pesca con cana Rason-Yanji
articles.content:
Tiene lugar festival de turismo de pesca con cana Rason-Yanji
Pyongyang, 28 de junio (ACNC) -- Segun el acuerdo de la Agencia de Viaje Internacional de Rason y la Agencia de Viaje de Yanbian Jiuzhou de la provincia de Jilin de China, tuvo lugar el dia 28 en la ciudad de Rason, zona economica y comercial de Corea, el festival de turismo de pesca con cana Rason-Yanji.
					El proposito del festival es para satisfacer la demanda de los turistas que desean gozar de una vida sentimental y desarrollar el intercambio y la cooperacion entre la Asociacion de Aficionados a la Pesca con Cana de la Ciudad de Rason y la Asociacion de Aficionados a la Pesca con Cana de la Region Autonoma de la Nacionalidad Coreana de Yanbian de la provincia de Jilin.
					
					En la ceremonia inaugural hubo discursos.
					
					Acto seguido, bajo la atencion de los aficionados se realizo la competencia de pesca con cana en agua dulce.
					
					Terminada la competencia hubo la premiacion.
					
					El festival sirvio de un motivo importante para desarrollar mas el turismo entre la ciudad de Rason y la provincia de Jilin.
					
					En el futuro se realizara en esta zona junto con la pesca con cana en agua dulce y en el mar.

articles.title: EE.UU. es provocador en la Peninsula Coreana, ratifica Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
EE.UU. es provocador en la Peninsula Coreana, ratifica Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 28 de junio (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que la capa dominante de Estados Unidos difunde de continuo el rumor de la "amenaza" proveniente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El texto revela con datos la historia de agresion de EE.UU. contra la RPDC y critica que este imperio es el autor y provocador que lleva al umbral de guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Los supuestos "actos provocadores" de la RPDC, mencionados por EE.UU., son los que haria cualquier Estado digno, que aprecia la independencia y la autodefensa, ejerciendo sus derechos legitimos, apunta el articulista y prosigue:
					
					Los hombres amantes de justicia y paz deberan juzgar sin prejuicio la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					La "unica superpotencia" del mundo libra en la tierra, el mar y el cielo cercanos a la RPDC los ejercicios belicos movilizando los efectivos de los paises satelites, que habian participado en la pasada guerra coreana, e introduciendo en gran escala modernos equipos de guerra nuclear, incluyendo el bombardero estrategico B-52 y el Stealth B-2A, el portaaviones y submarinos que se habian ganado mala fama en las guerras de Yugoslavia, Iraq y Afganistan, etc.
					
					Entonces, ?como se debe hacerle frente a un imperio como ese?
					
					EE.UU. circular el rumor de la inexistente "amenaza" de la RPDC para establecer la alianza militar tripartita con Japon y Sur de Corea aprovechando los recursos humanos y materiales de estos aliados inferiores y mantener asi la posicion de "unica superpotencia" tomando la superioridad estrategica y militar.
					
					El objetivo mas importante es acelerar los preparativos de la segunda guerra coreana.

articles.title: ACNC comenta nueva doctrina de combate de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC comenta nueva doctrina de combate de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 28 de junio (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos publico el plan de aplicar en la Peninsula Coreana la nueva doctrina de combate AIR-SEA BATTLE. 
					El pasado dia 19, el comandante de la septima fuerza aerea norteamericana dijo que lo esencial del nuevo metodo de combate es la operacion conjunta entre las fuerzas aereas y las navales desde la concentracion de efectivos hasta la entrada en combate de las fases tactica, operacional y estrategica. 
					
					El nuevo metodo fija como esfera de beligerancia todo el mundo, incluso la Peninsula Coreana, y supone las operaciones de desembarco de todas las fuerzas armadas terrestres, aereas, espaciales y ciberneticas. 
					
					Esto evidencia que se pone en practica la ambicion hegemonica de EE.UU. de ocupar toda la Peninsula Coreana y tomandola como trampolin, tomar el control politico y militar sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					Mantener a rayas a las potencias regionales y ampliar la esfera de su dominio mediante la supremacia militar es el nucleo de la estrategia hegemonica de EE.UU.
					
					Efectivamente, el imperio sigue aumentando sus fuerzas armadas en la region de Asia-Pacifica. 
					
					Ya se han emplazado en esta region mas de la mitad de los submarinos norteamericanos. Ahora el Oceano Pacifico se convierte en el campo de competencia de las potencias mundiales. 
					
					EE.UU. concede gran importancia a la nueva doctrina de combate con el fin de convertir favorablemente las correlaciones de fuerza en la region y ampliar su dominio. 
					
					La aplicacion de AIR-SEA BATTLE en la Peninsula Coreana parte de su posicion geopolitica en la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					EE.UU. vino "reestructurando" sus tropas terrestres ocupantes del Sur de Corea, y al mismo tiempo, aumentando en gran medida las fuerzas navales y aereas. 
					
					Al introducir muchos armamentos ultramodernos y destacamentos de flor y nata, convirtio el suelo surcoreano en el mayor arsenal del Extremo Oriente y base avanzada para el ataque nuclear preventivo. 
					
					Mediante la aplicacion de AIR-SEA BATTLE, el imperio pretende ubicar sus tropas estacionadas en el suelo surcoreano para favorecer el cumplimiento de su estrategia sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					En ese contexto, los cazas A-10 y F-16 ya desplegados en el Sur de Corea seran sustituidos por los F-35.
					
					Debido a ello, se torna mas grave la maniobra hegemonica de EE.UU. para aplastar a la RPDC, mantener a rayas a las potencias y tomar el control politico y militar sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico mediante las acciones militares colectivas. 
					
					La aventura militar de EE.UU. hace mas tensa la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno y se crea la crisis que puede extenderse a la guerra en cualquier momento. 
					
					Las circunstancias demandan fortalecer mas el disuasivo de guerra. 
					
					Hoy dia, gracias a la capacidad de autodefensa nacional que ha construido ya, la RPDC defiende con firmeza los intereses fundamentales de la revolucion y la dignidad del pais haciendo frente rotundo a la campana anti-RPDC de los imperialistas. 
					
					Dado que EE.UU. se obstina en atropellar con armas a la RPDC sin renunciar la politica hostil, la segunda seguira realizando grandes esfuerzos por defender la soberania nacional.
